titles: Hyberniae lachrymae or, a sad contemplation on the bleeding condition of Ireland. To the Honourable and excellently well accomplish Sir Iohn Clotworthy knight, and collonel.
notes: Verse - "I shall not here Sir, polish or repeat".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
